unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Rose Wells and Her Pet Alien's Significance Test
question_text:
Rose Wells has captured an alien and decides to keep it as a pet. Always curious, Rose wonders if the alien's average body temperature is the same as is normal for humans ($98.6^\circ$) and decides to do a significance test. Below are the alien's temperature readings, gathered at $6$ randomly selected times:
$85.1, 99.8, 93.7, 105.6, 98.2, 100.4$
If Rose assumes that the alien's body temperature follows a normal distribution, what would be the $p$-value of an appropriate significance test?

choices.text: A statistical test cannot be performed because we do not know the standard deviation of all of the alien's body temperatures.
